meta.label: Auto collaborative filtering
meta.description: First compute similarity scores between pairs of users or pairs of items. Then, compute affinity scores between users and items using the previous similarity scores.

outputRoles.name: scored_samples_dataset
outputRoles.label: Scored samples dataset
outputRoles.description: Dataset of user-item samples with collaborative filtering scores

outputRoles.name: similarity_scores_dataset
outputRoles.label: (Optional) Similarity scores dataset
outputRoles.description: Dataset of similarity scores used to compute the collaborative filtering scores

params.name: ratings_column_name
params.label: (Optional) Ratings column
params.description: If selected, ratings will be used to compute both similarity and affinty scores.

params.name: separator_preprocessing
params.label: Pre-processing parameters
params.description: Parameters to filter the input dataset to reduce the computation size.

params.name: user_visit_threshold
params.label: Minimum interactions per user
params.description: Keep only users that have interacted with more items.

params.name: item_visit_threshold
params.label: Minimum interactions per item
params.description: Keep only items that have interacted with more users.

params.name: timestamp_filtering
params.label: Use timestamp filtering
params.description: Makes the computations faster but scores less user-item pairs.

params.name: timestamps_column_name
params.label: Timestamp column
params.description: Column used to order items per user (higher values means more recent).

params.name: top_n_most_recent
params.label: Nb. of interactions to keep per user
params.description: Keep only the N most recent interactions per user based on the timestamp column.

params.name: separator_parameters
params.label: Similarity scores parameters
params.description: Similarity scores between pairs of users (user-based) or pairs of items (item-based) reflect how similar their interactions were.

params.name: separator_parameters
params.label: Affinity scores parameters
params.description: Affinity scores between users and items represent how likely is a user to interact positively with an item.

params.name: top_n_most_similar
params.label: Nb. of similar neighbors to consider
params.description: Compute affinity scores between a user u and an item i using the interactions of the top N users most similar to u (user-based) or the top N items most similar to i (item-based).
